title: Control Winds
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|Allows limited powers over the flow of air in caster's sight, blowing away or dissipating any nearby clouds affecting the caster or their allies.}}

'''Control Winds''' was a monsters-only spell which allowed the caster to continuously manipulate the wind to aid them and their allies. It was a self-enchant that acted for several turns after being cast, with the following effects:
*It immediately extinguished any [[tree|forest fires]] in [[line of sight]] of the caster.
*It blew [[cloud]]s away from the caster.
*Allied monsters within a few tiles of the caster got a boost to their accuracy with missile and thrown weapons.

The following monsters cast Control Winds:

{{monsterlink|Spriggan air mage}}

==History==
*Control Winds was removed in [[0.19]].
*Control Winds was added in [[0.13]].
